author: coar
msg: Treat the Vary response header field specially; change the
modules that touch it to use a new routine that only adds a
token if it isn't already present.  O(n^2) behaviour as
Dean points out, but absent set/atom operations it seems

author: ben
msg: Another hook (I won't be upset if someone else wants to do some!).

author: coar
msg: Proxy issue no longer a showstopper; push release date out by
a couple of days due to the recent flurry.
